title: Boards Bug
body:
Hey Everyone!

So, here is the bug: When I go on the boards (which I do frequently, so this is annoying) OP’s comment is just a blank space. Just nothing there, and all links and GIF’s and such are nullified. When I reset my laptop, then all is right again with the world, but after a while an hour or so then this happens again. 

I can read comments and such completely fine, and I can read the preview from the Boards Home menu, but everything else is gone. Hope this gets sorted out, thanks for reading!
